title: Density - compare blocks made of same material

content.question: Block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and Block <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> are made of the same material. The volume of Block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>V</mi></math> and the volume of Block <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> is <math alttext="3 V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mi>V</mi></math>. Which of the following correctly compares <math alttext="rho sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub></math>, the density of Block <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>, to <math alttext="rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>, the density of Block <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="rho sub X is less than rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="rho sub X equals rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="rho sub X is greater than rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>
The comparison cannot be made without knowing the mass of each block.

content.answer: <math alttext="rho sub X equals rho sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ρ</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
